revision.text: {{Doomwiki}}{{Doomwiki|link=Hexen:_Deathkings_of_the_Dark_Citadel|name=Deathkings...}}'''Hexen''' is a medieval first person shooter created by [[Raven Software]]. It is the sequel to [[Heretic]], and is arguably the most advanced Doom-based FPS to date, being the source of [[PolyObjects]] and [[ACS]]. It had one commercial expansion, [[Deathkings of the Dark Citadel]]. [[Category:Supported games]]
